name: The Manoir of Aveyron
description:
DESCRIPTION
Situated in a secure 7 acre estate in the department of Aveyron (Midi Pyrenees) this is a perfect location for a wedding event. We are located on the edge of a small friendly village (the local shop is only 100 meters from the front gate) and has beautiful scenary and local restaurants and cafes serving local produce for your guests to explore. Take a walk down to get fresh croissants - pain au chocolate... etc for breakfast! This 4-star holiday home has a hot tub and a sun terrace which will be an ideal location for a pre-wedding dinner and/or drinks reception on the big day.
In the Property and Grounds you have full and private use of the below facilities for the duration of your stay. We also have a selection of bikes...professional croquet set...Table Tennis... Golf and Tennis prectice Kits for you and your guests to enjoy.
The Manor House:
Available for bookings throughout the year (our peak seasons are July - September and Christmas)
The main house accommodates 12 people in style.. Four poster beds (one is 7' wide)
Open fire in the lounge.... two TV rooms... games room and Gym.
The grounds are around 7 acres and incorporate a heated swimming pool.
Outside dining (Weber BBQ)... Fire pit...childs play house
The Manor House Cottage:
Available all year (with the exception of high season) for weekly - weekend - multiple day lets.
The cottage is not available during peak season unless booked with the main house.
The Cottage accomodates 4 people with 2 bedrooms and has one bathroom.
Staff at the 24-hour reception speak English and French and will be on hand throughout your event to help. If you require any further information then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
Nearest airport: Aurillac Airport, (21 km)
additional_info:
FEATURES
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Pet friendly
